name: Bospop

config_properties.name: Bospop
config_properties.description: A classic rock and pop festival in Weert, Netherlands, held annually since 1981.

ai_profile:
**Bospop 2026: A Celebration of Rock and Beyond**  
Taking place from July 10-12, 2026, Bospop returns with an impressive lineup of 39 artists spanning a wide array of genres. Rooted in its rock heritage, the festival showcases 15 rock acts alongside subgenres like blues rock, alternative rock, indie rock, and hard rock. Adding to its eclectic appeal, the lineup features everything from symphonic metal and Celtic punk to funk and downtempo electronic, ensuring there's something for every music lover. With an average artist rating of 8.16, the lineup reflects a strong commitment to quality music, bolstered by 82% of artists having Spotify links for fans to explore their work.

The international spirit of Bospop shines through, with performers hailing from 10 countries, including the USA (10 artists), the Netherlands (7), and the UK (5). This geographic diversity is complemented by a mix of established and emerging artists, providing a dynamic blend of sounds and perspectives. Notably, the festival has a predominantly male lineup (26 acts), though it also features five female-led performances and one mixed-gender act. 

Bospop 2026 also reflects a growing awareness of diversity, with three artists identifying as people of color, though there is room for further inclusion. With a reputation for blending genre variety and high-quality performances, Bospop 2026 promises an unforgettable weekend of music and community for fans from around the globe.
